item.title: Version 0.15.3
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.15.3

Whatâ€™s New

  • French Translations: Added ~110 French translations covering context menus, settings, notifications, license view, share dialog, referral section, and more.

Bug Fixes

  • Compact Mode: Fixed broken banner cards and missing browser entries in compact sidebar view.
  • Arc Import: Fixed freezing and silent failures during import, with better feedback and support for the latest Arc data format.
  • Folder Ordering: Fixed folders continuously swapping positions by adding stable sort tiebreakers and deduplicating existing order values on startup.
  • Thread Safety: Moved SF Symbol validation off background threads to prevent potential crashes.
